item.title: Competitions
item.description: Below is some of the competitions I’ve competed in and our placement: Place Competition Location 1st Place   Department of Energy CyberForce Competition Chicago IL 2nd Place   National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition - Co-Captain   Orlando,Fl 1st Place   UB Network Defense Lockdown competition - Captain   Buffalo, NY 1st Place  Information Security Talent Search - Captain   Rochester, NY 1st Place   eSentinel National competition - Captain   Online 1st Place   Leidos Cyber Challenge - Captain   Augusta, GA Network Uptime Award   International Collegiate cyber defense Inviational   Seattle, WA 1st Place   Panoply Regional & National competition - Captain   Online 1st place   Southeast Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition - Co-Captain   Atlanta,GA 1st Student team   Symantec CTF - Captain   Online National Finalist   CyberPatriot National Finals - Captain   Baltimore, MD Speaking Engagements Derbycon 8 Maintaining post-exploitation opsec in a world with EDR Florida “In Focus” Smart Homes and Security 2018 Technology Exchange Training the Next Generation of Information Security Professionals Fox 35 news - Good day Orlando - Security information for Black Friday 2017 Interviewed, mentioned, or pictured in 50+ print publications.
